name: Astartes Weapon Specialisation
shortContent: A specified weapon type and class may not suffer less than a -30 penalty.
content:
A Space Marine is a master of the tools of warfare, but through
long practice and affinity he may reach a level of mastery
with a particular type of weapon so that it becomes a tool of
perfect destruction. When this Talent is taken, a type and class
of weapons must be specified, such as bolt (pistols) or melee
(chain). This Talent may be taken multiple times for different
types and classes of weapons. When using the specified type of
weapon, the Battle-Brother never suffers a penalty greater than
-30 when using the weapon.
